list_definition.definition: any sequence of seven days, especially from Sunday to Saturday

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: It’s three weeks since I saw her.

list_definition.definition: the five days from Monday to Friday inclusive

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: He can’t go during the week, but he’s free on Saturday or Sunday.

list_definition.definition: the amount of time spent working during a period of seven days
